name: 2022 6th International Conference on E-Commerce, E-Business and E-Government
content: Publication: The accepted and registered papers will be published published into ACM Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec index, et al. ICEEG 2022 ISBN number: 978-1-4503-9652-3
